mapper.select: SELECT farm_no as farmNo, farm_id as farmId, farm_pwd as farmPwd, farm_name as farmName, farm_busi_num as farmBusiNum, farm_email as farmEmail, farm_phone as farmPhone, farm_address_main as farmAddressMain, farm_address_sub as farmAddressSub, farm_enrolldate as farmEnrollDate, farm_end_yn as farmEndYN, rating as rating FROM farm WHERE farm_id=#{farmId} and farm_pwd=#{farmPwd} and farm_end_yn='N'
